short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time⚡️Shift: Effortless time zone conversion and meetings scheduling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. **Effortless Time Zone Conversion:** Select time zones and date, and TimeShift will tell you what time it is. Across the time zones and without hard math. Perfect for planning meetings with colleagues worldwide. 🌎
2. **Intuitive Interface:** TimeShift has a minimalistic and intuitive interface, that does the job. 🖥️
3. **Single-Click Meeting Scheduling:** With TimeShift, you can schedule meetings at a selected time. With a few clicks, without switching to a new page! ⏰
4. **Seamless Integration within the Browser:** TimeShift lives inside your internet browser. Always there one click away. No more apps, websites, favorite tabs, and bookmarks. 🚀
5. **Secure and Private:** All selection data is stored within your local browser. We don’t collect or store any personal or any other data from the users. 🔒
6. **Open Source:** All code is available on github 🤗
